name: pdf-to-markdown
description: PDF to Markdown Converter with LLM Enhancement
author: AI Assistant

tools.name: convert_pdf_to_markdown
tools.description: Convert a PDF file to Markdown format with smart structure detection using LLM analysis

pdf_path.description: Path to the PDF file to convert

output_dir.description: Output directory for the markdown file and images (optional)

output_name.description: Name for the output markdown file (optional)

extract_images.description: Whether to extract images from the PDF (default: true)

llm_api_url.description: LLM API URL for enhanced structure detection (optional)

tools.name: convert_pdf_from_base64
tools.description: Convert a base64-encoded PDF to Markdown format

filename.description: Original filename of the PDF (for naming output)

output_dir.description: Output directory for the markdown file and images (optional)

extract_images.description: Whether to extract images from the PDF (default: true)

llm_api_url.description: LLM API URL for enhanced structure detection (optional)

tools.name: analyze_pdf_structure
tools.description: Analyze PDF structure and return document hierarchy without full conversion

pdf_path.description: Path to the PDF file to analyze

llm_api_url.description: LLM API URL for enhanced structure detection (optional)

resources.name: PDF to Markdown Converter Information
resources.description: Information about the PDF to Markdown converter capabilities
